ContentTranslation.Title: 2018 MDX 9 Speed Automatic SH-AWD with Advance Package and Entertainment Package Featured Special Lease
ContentTranslation.ShortTitle: $350.00 per month for 24 months. $2,350.00 total due at signing.
ContentTranslation.OfferDetails: Applies to select new 2018 Acura MDX.
ContentTranslation.Content: $350.00 per month for 24 months. $2,350.00 total due at signing.
ContentTranslation.Disclaimer: Closed-end lease for 2018 MDX 9 Speed Automatic SH-AWD with Advance Package and Entertainment Package vehicles (YD4H9JKNW) available from January 23, 2019 through January 31, 2019, available to well-qualified lessees approved by Acura Financial Services. Not all lessees will qualify. Higher lease rates apply for lessees with lower credit ratings. MSRP $59,695.00 (includes destination, excludes tax, license, title fee, registration, documentation fee, options, insurance and the like). Actual net capitalized cost $25,000.00. Net capitalized cost includes $595 acquisition fee. Dealer contribution may vary and could affect actual lease payment. Total monthly payments $8,400.00. Option to purchase at lease end $34,026.15. Includes down payment with no security deposit. Excludes taxes, titles and either dealer fees or documentary service fee. For well-qualified lessees. Must take new retail delivery on vehicle from dealer stock by January 31, 2019. Lessee responsible for maintenance, excessive wear/tear and 15¢/mile over 10,000 miles/year for vehicles with MSRP less than $30,000, and 20¢/mile over 10,000 miles/year for vehicles with MSRP of $30,000 or more. See your Acura dealer for complete details.

ContentTranslation.Title: 2019 TLX 9 Speed Automatic with Advance Package Featured Special Lease
ContentTranslation.ShortTitle: $450.00 per month for 24 months. $2,950.00 total due at signing.
ContentTranslation.OfferDetails: Applies to select new 2019 Acura TLX.
ContentTranslation.Content: $450.00 per month for 24 months. $2,950.00 total due at signing.
ContentTranslation.Disclaimer: Closed-end lease for 2019 TLX 9 Speed Automatic with Advance Package vehicles (UB2F8KKNW) available from January 3, 2019 through February 28, 2019, available to well-qualified lessees approved by Acura Financial Services. Not all lessees will qualify. Higher lease rates apply for lessees with lower credit ratings. MSRP $44,945.00 (includes destination, excludes tax, license, title fee, registration, documentation fee, options, insurance and the like). Actual net capitalized cost $24,000.00. Net capitalized cost includes $595 acquisition fee. Dealer contribution may vary and could affect actual lease payment. Total monthly payments $10,800.00. Option to purchase at lease end $22,472.50. Includes down payment with no security deposit. Excludes taxes, titles and either dealer fees or documentary service fee. For well-qualified lessees. Must take new retail delivery on vehicle from dealer stock by February 28, 2019. Lessee responsible for maintenance, excessive wear/tear and 15¢/mile over 10,000 miles/year for vehicles with MSRP less than $30,000, and 20¢/mile over 10,000 miles/year for vehicles with MSRP of $30,000 or more. See your Acura dealer for complete details.
